bandedDailySupplyCharges.description: Array representing banded daily supply charge rates.  Mandatory if dailySupplyChargeType is BAND

measureUnit.description: The measurement unit of rate. Assumed to be DAYS if absent

unitPrice.description: The amount of daily supply charge for the band, in dollars per day exclusive of GST

dailySupplyCharge.description: The amount of access charge for the tariff period, in dollars per day exclusive of GST. Mandatory if dailySupplyChargeType is SINGLE

dailySupplyChargeType.description: Specifies if daily supply charge is single or banded.

demandCharges.description: Array of demand charges.  Required if rateBlockUType is demandCharges

amount.description: The charge amount per  measure unit exclusive of GST

chargePeriod.description: Charge period for the demand tariff

days.description: The days that the demand tariff applies to

endTime.description:
End of the period.

Formatted according to [ISO 8601 Times](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601#Times). If the time is provided without a UTC offset, the time zone will be determined by the value of EnergyPlanContract.timeZone.

maxDemand.description: Maximum demand for this demand tariff in kW.  If present, must be higher than the value of the minDemand field

measureUnit.description: The measurement unit of charge amount. Assumed to be KWH if absent

measurementPeriod.description: Application period for the demand tariff

minDemand.description: Minimum demand for this demand tariff in kW.  If absent then 0 is assumed

startTime.description:
Start of the period.

Formatted according to [ISO 8601 Times](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601#Times). If the time is provided without a UTC offset, the time zone will be determined by the value of EnergyPlanContract.timeZone.

displayName.description: The name of the tariff period

endDate.description: The end date of the tariff period in a calendar year.  Formatted in mm-dd format

rateBlockUType.description: Specifies the type of rate applicable to this tariff period

singleRate.description: Object representing a single rate.  Required if rateBlockUType is singleRate

generalUnitPrice.description: The block rate (unit price) for any usage above the included fixed usage, in dollars per kWh inclusive of GST.  Only required if pricingModel field is ‘QUOTA’

period.description: Usage period for which the block rate applies. Formatted according to [ISO 8601 Durations](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601#Durations) (excludes recurrence syntax)

rates.description: Array of controlled load rates in order of usage volume

measureUnit.description: The measurement unit of rate. Assumed to be KWH if absent

unitPrice.description: Unit price of usage per measure unit (exclusive of GST)

volume.description: Volume in kWh that this rate applies to.  Only applicable for ‘stepped’ rates where different rates apply for different volumes of usage in a period

startDate.description: The start date of the tariff period in a calendar year.  Formatted in mm-dd format

timeOfUseRates.description: Array of objects representing time of use rates.  Required if rateBlockUType is timeOfUseRates

period.description: Usage period for which the block rate applies. Formatted according to [ISO 8601 Durations](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601#Durations) (excludes recurrence syntax). Defaults to P1Y if absent

rates.description: Array of controlled load rates in order of usage volume

measureUnit.description: The measurement unit of rate. Assumed to be KWH if absent

unitPrice.description: Unit price of usage per  measure unit (exclusive of GST)

volume.description: Volume in kWh that this rate applies to.  Only applicable for ‘stepped’ rates where different rates apply for different volumes of usage in a period

days.description: The days that the rate applies to

endTime.description:
End of the period.

Formatted according to [ISO 8601 Times](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601#Times). If the time is provided without a UTC offset, the time zone will be determined by the value of EnergyPlanContract.timeZone.

startTime.description:
Start of the period.

Formatted according to [ISO 8601 Times](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601#Times). If the time is provided without a UTC offset, the time zone will be determined by the value of EnergyPlanContract.timeZone.

type.description: The type of usage that the rate applies to

timeZone.description: Specifies the charge specific time zone for calculation of the time of use thresholds. If absent, timezone value in EnergyPlanContract is assumed.

type.description: Type of charge. Assumed to be other if absent
